head.supplied: Melbourne, 7/7/76 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you that at a meeting of the Trustees of the Royal Park held this day it was unanimously resolved that the Trustees are unable to comply with th...

div.p: A345 Royal Park Zoological Society letter & minute book, p.60, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

I have the honor to inform you that at a meeting of the Trustees of the Royal Park held this day it was unanimously resolved that the Trustees are unable to comply with the request of the Brunswick borough Council as conveyed in your letter of the 25th June
The Brunswick Borough Council had requested that a portion of the Royal Park be excised and transferred to its control; see Trustees' minute book, minutes of meeting of 7 July 1876.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
